SEARCH
Package io.github.atreia108.vega.core

Class HLAObjectManager

java.lang.Object
io.github.atreia108.vega.core.HLAObjectManager
public final class HLAObjectManager extends Object
The HLAObjectManager enables the creation, update, and destruction of instances of an HLA object class. In Vega, an ECS entity corresponds to an HLA object instance. The IDataConverter and IMultiDataConverter IEntityArchetype interfaces form part of a conversion layer to translate between the HLA's object-oriented design and data-oriented design.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Hridyanshu Aatreya

  • Method Details

    • registerInstance

      public static boolean registerInstance(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity)
      Registers an HLA object instance for a valid entity. A valid entity in this case:
      • Contains an HLAObjectComponent.
      • The className field in the component is set to an object class defined in the simulation's project file.
      • The instanceName field in the component contains a name (non-conflicting with other objects) for the instance.
      Invalid entities are rejected and the object is not registered.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity representing the object instance.
      Returns:
      outcome of the operation as a true or false value.

    • updateInstance

      public static boolean updateInstance(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity)
      Updates the entity's corresponding object instance (if it exists) at the RTI with the latest values.
      Parameters:
      entity - the entity to be updated.
      Returns:
      outcome of the operation as a true or false value.

    • destroyInstance

      public static boolean destroyInstance(com.badlogic.ashley.core.Entity entity)
      Destroys the entity's corresponding object instance (if it exists) at the RTI.
      Parameters:
      entity - entity representing the object instance.
      Returns:
      outcome of the operation as a true or false value.
